config.fertilization.addDropsDirectlyToI: Set to true if compressed bone meal drops should go straight into the player's inventory.
Add Drops directly to Machine's Inventory
Set to true if compressed bone meal drops should go straight into the machine's inventory when used automatically.
config.fertilization.allowBoneMealOnSapl: Enable Use of Bone Meal on Saplings
This enables use of extremely compressed bone meal to turn saplings into large fancy trees.
config.fertilization.allowBoneMealOnVine: Enable Use of Bone Meal on Vines
This enables use of normal Bone Meal on vines in order to grow them downwards.
config.fertilization.allowBoneMealOnSuga: Enable Use of Bone Meal on Sugar Canes
This enables use of normal Bone Meal on sugar canes in order to grow them upwards.
config.fertilization.compressedBoneMealP: The amount of bone meal applied to the plant when using compressed bone meal.
config.fertilization.extremelyCompressed: The amount of bone meal applied to the plant when using extremely compressed bone meal.
config.fertilization.floristsBoneMealMax: The maximum amount of flowers that can spawn when using Florist's Bone Meal on grass.
The maximum range that flowers can spawn when using Florist's Bone Meal on grass.
config.fertilization.flowerBlocks: Blocks Duplicated by Florist's Bone Meal
config.fertilization.flowerBlocks.toolti: List of blocks that can be duplicated by using Florist's Bone Meal on them.
